name: Alea Research
title: Macro Dose Tariffs Openai More
text:
Synopsis
The global market is experiencing significant volatility due to Trump's aggressive tariff policies, with potential long-term economic implications for international trade and substantial impacts on crypto and AI markets.

Key Insights
- Crypto markets experienced massive liquidation, with over $2.3B liquidated and $188B wiped out in 24 hours
- Bitcoin fell to $92K before recovering to $95.6K, while Ethereum dropped 18% and recovered to just under $2.6K
- Trump imposed tariffs on major trading partners: 10% on China and 25% on Canada and Mexico
- OpenAI launched "Deep Research", an AI agent capable of performing a "single-digit percentage" of economically valuable white-collar tasks
- India, the 5th largest economy nominally, is reviewing its crypto regulatory framework, potentially considering a 70% tax on undisclosed crypto capital gains
- The tariff situation suggests Trump views tariffs as a potential alternative income stream and is willing to accept short-term economic pain for perceived long-term benefits
- AI agents market has declined from a peak of $22B to $7.13B, indicating potential market volatility in the sector
